Welcome to Miami Watersports, South Florida’s largest water sports rental center since 2007! We offer a wide range of water activities year-round with over 20 dedicated employees both online and in person. As a direct provider, we are committed to providing outstanding customer service and ensuring a seamless rental experience. We are here to exceed your expectations, where passion meets professionalism for an unforgettable water sports adventure. How high can I fly on a flyboard?
With proper instruction and practice, participants can fly up to 20 feet above the water's surface on a flyboard. However, the height may vary depending on factors such as skill level.
What should I wear for flyboarding?
We recommend wearing swimwear or athletic clothing that allows for freedom of movement. For women, we advise wearing a secure-fitting swimsuit to minimize the risk of it coming loose when propelled into the water.
Can I bring my own equipment, such as a GoPro, to capture the experience?
Yes, you're welcome to bring your own equipment, such as a waterproof camera or GoPro, to capture the excitement of flyboarding. However, please ensure that all equipment is securely attached to you to prevent loss during the session.
What if I fall off the flyboard?
Falling off the flyboard is part of the learning process, and our instructors will be nearby to assist you if needed. You will be equipped with a life jacket, foam helmet, and the flyboard itself floats, providing additional safety measures in case of falls.
Can I flyboard if I can't swim?
While basic swimming skills are recommended, they are not mandatory. Your instructor will provide guidance and support throughout the session, and you will be equipped with a life jacket, foam helmet, and the flyboard itself floats, ensuring your safety in the water. Staying calm and following instructions will enhance your flyboarding experience.
Is flyboarding physically demanding?
While flyboarding requires some physical exertion, participants of all fitness levels can enjoy the experience. Our instructors will provide guidance on proper body positioning and technique to help you get the most out of your session.
What if I have a fear of heights?
If you have a fear of heights, our instructors will work with you to ensure that you feel comfortable and confident during your flyboarding session. They will provide support and encouragement to help you overcome any fears and enjoy the experience safely.
What is flyboarding?
Flyboarding is a water sport where participants strap into a board connected to a watercraft's jet propulsion system, allowing them to hover above the water's surface and perform aerial maneuvers.
Do I need prior experience to try flyboarding?
No prior experience is necessary! Our experienced instructors will provide comprehensive training and guidance before your session, ensuring that even beginners can enjoy the thrill of flyboarding.
Is flyboarding safe?
Yes, flyboarding is generally considered safe when conducted under the supervision of trained professionals and following safety guidelines. Our instructors prioritize safety and will provide all necessary equipment and instructions to ensure a safe experience.
